name: FLIGHT SCHOOL ASSOCIATION OF NORTH AMERICA
description: Brand awareness/education on Capitol Hill, FAA reauthorization
sampleDescriptions: Lobbied in support of including language in the FAA Reauthorization Act that would implement a 14-day maximum time period for students to be able to schedule an airman practical test.
